event.title: Bristol Creative Code
event.description:
WE WILL PUT THE FOOTBALL ON A BIG SCREEN IN THE BACKGROUND WITH THE SOUND LOW & THERE WILL BE BEER

• What we'll do
This meetup is for anyone who is interested in using code creatively, physical computing and digital art. Including Unity, Open Frameworks, Processing, Pure Data, Gibber, Sonic Pi, Overtone etc. (All languages, not just Clojure.)

• What to bring
A laptop and and an open mind. If you have a project to work on that's great.
